name: Car Parking - Driving school
description:
Car Parking that is so real, it will blow your mind!
Show your car parking skills in this amazing Car Parking - Driving School game. It is an amazing, physics based car parking simulator game, that is fun and challenging.
Car Parking - Driving School, has many fast, furious and agile cars to choose from. Select your favourite car, put your car in gear and accelerate to move forward.
This physics based, Car Parking - Driving School game will test your parking abilities and your car steering skills! Navigate your car with the utmost precision, through the parking lot to your destined parking spot. Put your car in reverse gear to Reverse park.
Manoeuvre your car between various obstacles, parked cars and in small spaces, to park without crashing. Be careful you don’t crash or you will fail the level.
To make Car Parking - Driving School, more exciting, we have two play modes for you to select from. Race against the clock in the Time Attack mode or choose the Free Ride mode to play a relaxed game.
You can select the difficulty level in Car Parking - Driving School. Play the Rookie difficulty mode or challenge yourself in the Professional difficulty mode.
FEATURES of Car Parking - Driving School:
Exciting achievements
Huge parking lot, with beautiful shiny cars parked
Manoeuvre your car between various obstacles
Smooth and realistic handling
Realistic game sounds
Many shiny cars to choose from
Easy to learn and drive
Stunning 3D graphics
